thread.title: Mirror's Edge demo now on XBL...

post.author: iceheart
post.body:
... It's very short, however, it pretty much entirely consists of what we've seen in trailers so far.

However, it seems to be great fun, and in my opinion quite possibly the most beautifully designed game ever made. I'm definitely holding on to my pre-order .
